#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	int T; cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		string galadriel = "" , cgalad = "";
		cin >> galadriel;
		cgalad = galadriel;
		reverse(galadriel.begin(),galadriel.end());
		
		cout << (cgalad == galadriel ? "YES\n" : "NO\n");

	}//end while
	
	return 0;
	
}//end main
